EmailTemplate.Body:
Review Owners,

In response to General IT Controls (GITC) for ”Review of User Access”, the review of access to GEAC for your direct reports starts on $dayReviewBegins $reviewBeginDate.

Element managers are responsible for ensuring that only authorized individuals have appropriate access to our key financial reporting applications. User access reviews are performed quarterly. These reviews help safeguard Element's assets and financial reporting data and support the CEO/CFO controls certification.

User Review Completion Process

Take the following steps to complete the review:

Step Action
1Log in to the $applicationName
2Locate your name
3Review your listed direct reports and their access to GEAC on columns 1 to 4
4Click on the “SAVE” icon to save your responses 

This round of reviews must be completed no later than $dayReviewEnds $reviewEndDate EOD.

Review Owners Responsibility

  • It is the manager’s responsibility to review system access for each direct report.
  • If response or confirmation is not completed by $dayReviewEnds $reviewEndDate then your direct manager will receive notification that the target date was missed, and responsibility will shift to your direct manager.
  • If no response is received by $dayReviewEnds $reviewEndDate then the GEAC mainframe access for the identified users will be disabled.

Here is our standard review schedule:

Step Entitlement review
Communication/Action 		Sent To Responsibilible Party for Entitlement Review Due Date
1 Start of the Entitlement Review Review Owners (1st tier Managers) Review Owners (1st tier Managers) Day 0
2 Friendly reminder that reviewes are due soon(by day 10) Review Owners (1st tier Managers) Review Owners (1st tier Managers) Day 7
3 First overdue reminder Review Owners (1st tier Managers) Review Owners (1st tier Managers) Day 10
4 Second overdue reminder Review Owners (2nd tier Managers) Review Owners (2nd tier Managers) Day 13
5 Final overdue reminder Review Owners (2nd tier Managers) Review Owners (2nd tier Managers) Day 16
6 User will be disabled Review Owners (2nd tier Managers) Day 20

Consequence of Noncompliance

Access to this system will be disabled for any user not reviewed by the Review Owner or their Direct Manager. We have obtained Executive team’s support for this, and EVPs will receive an update on compliance with this control on an exception basis.

Contact

If you have any questions about the process, please contact Clifton Sookdeo.
